attributes.action: Instead of clapping for the nhs staff let’s get them a pay rise
attributes.additional_details: The nhs staff have worked so hard throughout the first COVID-19 wave and are now facing an even harder time with the 2nd wave. We need to make sure they are rewarded for all their efforts and the dedication they  have shown.
attributes.background: Pay our nhs staff properly and give them a substantial rise.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356
